description:
In this course titled ' Hypnosis - Heal Your Asthma With Self Hypnosis and Imagery.' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • The reasons that cause asthma
  • Learn how hypnosis can accelerate your healing process with the powerful techniques of self hypnosis, visualization, imagery and affirmations
You will be able to reduce and heal your asthma and breathing problems instantly using powerful imagery , self hypnosis , positive visualizations and affirmations.

You will be able to reduce stress, sleep problems, depression and negative thinking using powerful affirmations which is given as a bonus along with the lecture .

This course is very useful for those are mentally and physically suffering from the affects of asthma and breathing problems.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 9 lectures in English.

It is ideal for everyone who want to heal asthma.

This course contains-

Lecture1:Introduction

oLecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture6:Visualization Exercise: Heal Asthma Easily

oLecture7:Summary

oLecture8:Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity

Lecture 9: Bonus Exercise - General Healing Audio File
title: Hypnosis - Heal Your Asthma With Self Hypnosis and Imagery
